description:
Alain`s Metagross was revealed in the Kalos League finals after the battlefield change. It is possibly the evolved form of Alain`s Metang but it was not confirmed.
Pikachu, who had been resting from its battle with Alain`s Tyranitar, was matched up against Metagross. Metagross dominated a lot of the match until Pikachu was able to jump on its back and hit it with a Thunderbolt. Metagross managed to shake it off but Pikachu fought back hard and finished off Metagross with its Iron Tail.
name: Metagross (Alan)
